Title: Oopiri
Writer: Vamshi Paidipally (screenplay), Vamshi Paidipally (story adaptation), Abburi Ravi (dialogue)
Actors: Nagarjuna Akkineni, Karthi, Tamannaah Bhatia, Prakash Raj
Plot: Impressed by his carefree attitude, Vikram, a quadriplegic multi-billionaire, hires a convict out on parole as his caretaker. What follows is a string of life lessons they learn from each other.
